info.description: API for Meeting Assistant application with OAuth, room management, and LiveKit integration
info.title: Meeting Assistant API

get.description: Processes the OAuth callback from Google and sets a HttpOnly session cookie. Redirects to frontend callback URL configured in FrontendURL setting.

307.description: Redirect to frontend callback URL with session_id HttpOnly cookie

401.description: Authentication failed - invalid code or state

get.description: Redirects user to Google OAuth consent screen. State stored in-memory (15 min expiry) and as HttpOnly cookie (CSRF protection).

307.description: Redirect to Google OAuth consent page

post.description: Invalidates the session and logs out the user. Supports session_id cookie (preferred) or refresh_token in body (backwards compatibility).

parameters.description: Refresh token (optional, only for backwards compatibility)
parameters.name: request

get.description: Returns the authenticated user's information. Supports Authorization header (Bearer) or session cookie.

post.description: Gets a new access token using session_id from HttpOnly cookie or header. No request body needed.

200.description: Token refreshed successfully with access_token and expires_in

post.description: Generates a test JWT token for testing API with Postman. ONLY for development/testing. Use OAuth flow in production.

get.description: Retrieves all room invitations sent to the current user's email

post.description:
Manually triggers AI processing (transcription and analysis) for a meeting recording

**Use cases:**
- Testing AI pipeline without recording a live meeting
- Reprocessing a meeting with updated AI prompts
- Recovery when automatic processing failed
- Host requesting re-analysis with custom parameters (future enhancement)

**Note:** In production, AI processing is automatically triggered when a meeting ends via LiveKit webhook.
This endpoint is primarily for manual intervention, testing, and future custom processing features.

400.description: Missing recording_url or invalid meeting ID

get.description:
Retrieves the comprehensive AI-generated meeting summary with analysis

**Response includes:**
- Executive summary (2-3 sentence overview)
- Key points with timestamps and importance levels
- Decisions made with owners and impact assessment
- Topics discussed (main themes ordered by importance)
- Key questions raised (important questions including unanswered ones)
- Chapters & Topics (auto-generated meeting sections from AssemblyAI)
- Action items with assignments, priorities, and due dates
- Sentiment analysis (overall and per-speaker breakdown)
- Engagement metrics (speaking time, participation balance)

**Status codes:**
- 200: Summary available and returned
- 202: Summary is being generated (check back later)
- 404: Meeting not found or no recording available

404.description: Meeting not found or no transcript available

get.description: Gets a paginated list of rooms with optional filters

post.description: Creates a new meeting room with specified settings

get.description: Gets detailed information about a specific room

patch.description: Transfers the host role to another participant (host only)

400.description: Invalid room ID, new host ID, or new host is not a participant

get.description: Retrieves all invitations for a room (host only)

post.description: Allows the host to invite a user to join the room by providing their email
Accepts an invitation to join a room
Declines an invitation to join a room

get.description: Gets a list of all participants in a room

post.description: Allows a user to join an existing room and get LiveKit credentials

200.description: Successfully joined room with LiveKit credentials

400.description: Invalid room ID or room is full

delete.description: Allows a user to leave a room they are currently in

get.description:
Allows users to check their participant status and receive token when admitted
This is used for polling while waiting in the waiting room
Gets a list of participants waiting for approval in a room (host only)

delete.description: Removes a participant from the room (host/co-host only)

post.description: Admits a waiting participant to join the room (host only)

Permanently blocks a participant from joining the room (hard block - user cannot join again)
Note: This is different from deny - blocked users cannot request to join again

Denies a waiting participant from joining the room (soft rejection - user can try joining again)
Note: This removes the waiting request. For permanent blocking, use the block endpoint instead.

200.description: Participant denied successfully (can request to join again)

get.description: Generate a presigned URL for downloading a file from MinIO
List all files in the MinIO bucket with optional prefix filter
Get information about the MinIO bucket and connection status

post.description: Test uploading a text file to MinIO to verify connection and credentials
Receives webhook events from AssemblyAI when transcription completes
Receives webhook events from LiveKit server with JWT signature validation

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
